name: 2D Platformer Final (gerlac32)
description:
Modifications:

1. I created individual levels 1, 2, and 3. Each level leads into the next.

2. I added two powerups: a speed boost (green) and the other is a jump boost (purple). Both visual designs are based on the score pickup.

3. I created two enemies: a speedy enemy based on the basic walker but moves at a much faster speed and is yellow, and a boss enemy based on the smart walker but has more health, is red, and is larger than the smart walker.

Created by Soren Gerlach
